effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
攻撃と　同時に　道具を　盗む。
自分が　道具を　持っている　場合は
盗めない。

The user attacks and steals the target’s
held item simultaneously. The user can’t
steal anything if it already holds an item.

Chi la usa attacca il bersaglio e può rubargli
lo strumento, se non ne ha già uno.

Impide que el objetivo utilice el objeto que lleve
y que su Entrenador use objetos sobre él.

Der Anwender greift an und stiehlt dem Ziel
gleichzeitig ein Item, sofern er selbst gerade
kein Item trägt.

Le lanceur attaque la cible et vole son objet.
Le lanceur ne peut rien voler s’il tient déjà
un objet.

공격과 동시에 도구를 훔친다.
자신이 도구를 지니고 있을 경우에는
훔칠 수 없다.

こうげきと　どうじに　もちものを
ぬすむ。　じぶんに　もちものが
あると　しっぱいする。

The user attacks and steals the
target’s held item simultaneously. It
can’t steal if the user holds an item.

son objet. Le lanceur ne peut rien
voler s’il tient déjà un objet.

The user attacks and steals the foe’s
held item simultaneously. It can’t
steal if the user holds an item.

An attack that may
take the foe’s held
item if the user
isn’t holding one.

While attacking,
it may steal the
foe’s held item.
